parameters.name: alarmModelName
parameters.description: The name of the alarm model.

nested_items.name: alarmModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the alarm model.

nested_items.name: alarmModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the alarm model.

nested_items.name: keyValue
nested_items.description: The value of the key used as a filter to select only the alarms associated with the key.

nested_items.name: alarmState
nested_items.description: Contains information about the current state of the alarm.

nested_items.name: stateName
nested_items.description: The name of the alarm state. The state name can be one of the following values:
DISABLED - When the alarm is in the DISABLED state, it isn't ready to evaluate data. To enable the alarm, you must change the alarm to the NORMAL state.
NORMAL - When the alarm is in the NORMAL state, it's ready to evaluate data.
ACTIVE - If the alarm is in the ACTIVE state, the alarm is invoked.
ACKNOWLEDGED - When the alarm is in the ACKNOWLEDGED state, the alarm was invoked and you acknowledged the alarm.
SNOOZE_DISABLED - When the alarm is in the SNOOZE_DISABLED state, the alarm is disabled for a specified period of time. After the snooze time, the alarm automatically changes to the NORMAL state.

LATCHED - When the alarm is in the LATCHED state, the alarm was invoked. However, the data that the alarm is currently evaluating is within the specified range. To change the alarm to the NORMAL state, you must acknowledge the alarm.

nested_items.name: ruleEvaluation
nested_items.description: Information needed to evaluate data.

nested_items.name: simpleRuleEvaluation
nested_items.description: Information needed to compare two values with a comparison operator.

nested_items.name: inputPropertyValue
nested_items.description: The value of the input property, on the left side of the comparison operator.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: The comparison operator.

nested_items.name: thresholdValue
nested_items.description: The threshold value, on the right side of the comparison operator.

nested_items.name: customerAction
nested_items.description: Contains information about the action that you can take to respond to the alarm.

nested_items.name: actionName
nested_items.description: The name of the action. The action name can be one of the following values:
SNOOZE - When you snooze the alarm, the alarm state changes to SNOOZE_DISABLED.
ENABLE - When you enable the alarm, the alarm state changes to NORMAL.
DISABLE - When you disable the alarm, the alarm state changes to DISABLED.
ACKNOWLEDGE - When you acknowledge the alarm, the alarm state changes to ACKNOWLEDGED.
RESET - When you reset the alarm, the alarm state changes to NORMAL.

nested_items.name: snoozeActionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of a snooze action.

nested_items.name: snoozeDuration
nested_items.description: The snooze time in seconds. The alarm automatically changes to the NORMAL state after this duration.

nested_items.name: note
nested_items.description: The note that you can leave when you snooze the alarm.

nested_items.name: enableActionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of an enable action.

nested_items.name: note
nested_items.description: The note that you can leave when you enable the alarm.

nested_items.name: disableActionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of a disable action.

nested_items.name: note
nested_items.description: The note that you can leave when you disable the alarm.

nested_items.name: acknowledgeActionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of an acknowledge action.

nested_items.name: note
nested_items.description: The note that you can leave when you acknowledge the alarm.

nested_items.name: resetActionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of a reset action.

nested_items.name: note
nested_items.description: The note that you can leave when you reset the alarm.

nested_items.name: systemEvent
nested_items.description: Contains information about alarm state changes.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The event type. If the value is STATE_CHANGE, the event contains information about alarm state changes.

nested_items.name: stateChangeConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of alarm state changes.

nested_items.name: triggerType
nested_items.description: The trigger type. If the value is SNOOZE_TIMEOUT, the snooze duration ends and the alarm automatically changes to the NORMAL state.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: A non-negative integer that reflects the severity level of the alarm.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time the alarm was created, in the Unix epoch format.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time the alarm was last updated, in the Unix epoch format.
